configuration.application_title: COVID-19 Medical Resource Demand Dashboard - US National

scenarios.description: This is the April 15th run of the Unmitigated model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 7 days.
This is the April 15th run of the Unmitigated model (ie, no social distancing) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
This is the April 15th run of the Pause-Apr30-ImproveTest model (social distancing until April 30th) with length of hospital stay set to 7 days.
This is the April 15th run of the Pause-Apr30-ImproveTest model (social distancing until April 30th) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
This is the April 15th run of the Pause-indefinite model (ie, social distancing for the foreseeable future) with length of hospital stay set to 7 days.
This is the April 15th run of the Pause-indefinite model (ie, social distancing for the foreseeable future) with length of hospital stay set to 14 days.
